name: Grand Expectation
title: Bennett: Grand Expectation
desc: The best adventure is always yet to be.

source: Reward for inviting Bennett to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1303], equip this card.
After $[A1303] equips this card, immediately use $[S13033] once.
When your $[A1303], who has this card equipped, creates an Inspiration Field, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
(You must have $[A1303] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
